mapper.select: SELECT seq_user_no AS 'userNo' ,user_name AS 'userName' FROM board.users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE board.contents SET content_hit = content_hit + 1 WHERE content_no = #{contentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CT.CONTENT_NO AS 'contentNo' ,CT.CONTENT_TITLE AS 'title' ,CT.CONTENT_CONTENT AS 'content' ,CT.CONTENT_HIT AS 'hit' ,DATE_FORMAT(CONTENT_REGDATE, '%x-%c-%d') AS 'date' ,US.USER_NAME AS 'userName' ,US.SEQ_USER_NO AS 'userNo' ,FI.files_save_name AS 'saveName' ,FI.files_no AS 'filesNo' FROM BOARD.CONTENTS CT INNER JOIN BOARD.USERS US ON CT.CONTENT_USER_NO = US.SEQ_USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD.FILES FI ON CT.CONTENT_NO = FI.FILES_BOARD_NO WHERE CT.CONTENT_NO = #{contentNo}
SELECT IFNULL(MIN(content_no), -1) AS contentNo FROM board.contents WHERE content_no > #{content_no}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(content_no), -1) AS contentNo FROM board.contents WHERE content_no < #{content_no}

SELECT CT.CONTENT_NO AS 'contentNo' ,CT.CONTENT_TITLE AS 'title' ,CT.CONTENT_CONTENT AS 'content' ,CT.CONTENT_HIT AS 'hit' ,DATE_FORMAT(CONTENT_REGDATE, '%x-%c-%d') AS 'date' ,US.USER_NAME AS 'userName' ,US.SEQ_USER_NO AS 'userNo' FROM BOARD.CONTENTS CT INNER JOIN BOARD.USERS US ON CT.CONTENT_USER_NO = US.SEQ_USER_NO
WHERE CT.CONTENT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE US.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE CT.CONTENT_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY CONTENT_REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD.CONTENTS CT INNER JOIN BOARD.USERS US ON CT.CONTENT_USER_NO = US.SEQ_USER_NO
WHERE CT.CONTENT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE US.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE CT.CONTENT_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT RP.REPLY_NO AS 'replyNo' ,RP.REPLY_CONTENT AS 'reply' ,DATE_FORMAT(RP.REPLY_REGDATE, '%x-%c-%d %H:%i') AS 'date' ,US.USER_NAME AS 'userName' FROM BOARD.REPLY RP INNER JOIN BOARD.USERS US ON RP.USER_NO = US.SEQ_USER_NO WHERE RP.CONTENT_NO = #{contentNo} ORDER BY RP.REPLY_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board.reply SET reply_content = #{reply}, content_no = #{contentNo}, user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT user_no FROM board.reply WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
